title: CHEYENNE (1955) 112 Fury At Rio Hondo [retr?tv]
description:
CHEYENNE (1955) 

12. Fury at Rio Hondo   4/17/1956
"Fury at Rio Hondo" is a retelling of "To Have and to Have Not" transfered to a Western setting with Peggy Castle outstanding in the Lauren Bacall role. Cheyenne and his alcoholic sidekick, Pete, are based in a small Mexican town with a wagon available for hire. However, since Maximilian&#039;s occupation of Mexico for France is happening around them business is not what it could be. After a customer who owes them a large sum fails to pay, they are forced against their better judgment to violate their preferred neutrality and to take a job for the rebels transporting a fugitive on the run from the French to the United States. Through all this runs the stormy relationship between Cheyenne and Mary "Mississippi" Brown, a sultry Southern Belle and pickpocket.

Director: Walter Doniger
Cast: Clint Walker (Cheyenne Bodie), Ralph Moody (Pete), Peggie Castle (Mississippi), Mel Welles (Bolados), Karen Kadler (Isabella Montalban), Tom Hernandez (Ramon Montalban), Pepe Hern (Ricardo), Tim Graham (I) (Piano Player), Roger Etienne (Lt. Beauclerc), Carl Esmond (Colonel Pickard), Edward Colmans (Manuel)
